title: Toxicology Abstracts
description: Specifically focused to meet the needs of toxicologists, Toxicology Abstracts covers issues from social poisons and substance abuse to natural toxins, from legislation and recommended standards to environmental issues. The database surveys the literature for toxicology studies of industrial and agricultural chemicals, household products, pharmaceuticals, and myriad other substances. Topics of coverage include the effects of alcohol and smoking, drug abuse, hydrocarbon studies, nitrosamines, radiation and radioactive materials, toxicity testing methodology, and analytical procedures for toxic substances.
